title: Prime Loops - Phantom Trap
description:
Can you feel a haunting presence in the room? Plague your productions with Phantom Trap and appease the demons in your tunes! This disturbing sample pack comes to you straight from our eerie studio located deep inside Prime LoopsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ devilish mansion from latest recruit Redboy Beatz. We strapped on our Jason mask and slashed up some freakish forces to channel into this all new Trap sample pack, allowing you to haunt your productions with some devilishly dark and creepy elements!

When the sun goes down, listen real close and you'll hear some truly chilling soundsÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ twisted Trap style beats mastered with ethereal elements are all the rage right now, evident in tracks by the likes of Drake, 2Chainz, Rick Ross, DJ Khaled and of course, JMSN. Phantom Trap summons all manner of dark forces to help you achieve these sounds in addition to a cavernous selection of shadowy Bass, Synth and SFX.

Creeping in at 621MB, Phantom Trap is available via direct download and will haunt your sample library with 7 ample folders of Basslines, Drum Loops, Drum One-Shots and Solo Drums, Lead Synths, SFX Loops and SFX Shots. With tempo and key displayed clearly in each file name, you can select your samples from the download folder, drag and drop them into any major DAW and then edit them live in your mix! If you wanna push that tempo higher, just grab the end of the stem and drag it to match the BPM you need. Supplied in stunning 24-bit HD quality, this incredibly pure clarity will remain completely uncorrupted, no matter how much you wanna mess with these sounds. From crisp claps and blunt snares to resonant kicks and fizzing open-hats to a vast array of spine tingling synths, including brooding brass, haunted pianos and unexpected impacts, there's plenty to ensure your productions go bump in the night with the darkest sound achievable!

So you think your productions are ready for the afterlife? Knock 'em dead and then bring 'em back with Phantom Trap. This one's a terrifying force that will truly put frighteners on your tunes and it's completely royalty free, so you can spend that extra income on an exorcist to expel the demons from your studio!


Just unzip the folder and enjoy!!
